Requirement: The SSH protocol version 2 must be used.
SSH moduli smaller than 2048 must not be used.
Only approved key exchange algorithms must be used.
Only approved ciphers algorithms must be used.
Only approved MAC algorithms must be used.
Only approved Host Key Algorithms (a.k.a. public key signature algorithms or server authentication algorithms) must be used.
SSH logging must be enabled.
SSH LoginGraceTime must be set to one minute or less.
SSH MaxAuthTries must be set to 5 or less.
SSH root login must be disabled.
SSH strict mode must be enabled.
SSH user authentication must be done with public keys.
SSH password authentication must be disabled.
SSH IgnoreRhosts must be enabled.
SSH HostbasedAuthentication must be disabled.
The usage of the SSH service must be restricted to dedicated groups or users.
column4: Missing algorithm(s): found incorrect HostKeyAlgotithm: wrong group: LinuxUsers,

Requirement: The SSH Idle Timeout Interval must be configured to an adequate time.
SSH tunnel devices must be disabled.
SSH TCP port forwarding must be disabled.
SSH agent forwarding must be disabled.
SSH gateway ports must be disabled.
SSH X11 forwarding must be disabled.
SSH PermitUserEnvironment must be disabled.
SSH PermitEmptyPasswords must be disabled.
If SFTP is activated, internal server of OpenSSH must be used.
